parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~98094~~) operation to query information about all clusters that are deployed in a specified region, such as the cluster ID.

parameters.name: FilterRegion
parameters.description: Specify the region in which you want to query GDNs. You can create secondary clusters for the GDNs.

parameters.name: GDNDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the GDN. The description must meet the following requirements:

*   It cannot start with [http:// or https://.](http://https://ã€‚)
*   It must start with a letter.
*   It can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   It must be 2 to 126 characters in length.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 30. Valid values:

*   30
*   50
*   100

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
